alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:27PM EST until January 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EST FOR TELFAIR...WHEELER AND WEST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 1227 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Alamo to near Horse Creek Wma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Scotland, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan, and Workmore. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
